channel.title: Client/Server Error?!?!?!?!?!
channel.description:
Right now this is pissing me off heres the problem every client I use when type in username, pass and put server up it says error connectiong to server... and says nothing in server log, I've used lot's of clients like Silabsoft, Mopar, My Own, CSK, And much more but as always them same ERROR CONNECTING TO SERVER
NOTE:I used diffrent servers too and there the same ports and i have tried to put in 127.0.0.1
Yet again i have deleted my caches and downloaded them again but still no connection.
And i have turned firewall off....
Any ideas =]?
Add me on msn if your going to help me Pjwim25@hotmail.com
